Package game.common

Class Summary
Direction Enum Direction.
GameConf Class GameSettings used to read the xml configuration file
Needed library: JDOM
GameConf.EnemyInfo Utility class used to store some informations for the creation of enemies
GameTimer Class Game Timer
Used for manage time in the game
ImagesContainer A class that contains and handles all images
used in the main menu of the Game
KeyConverter Utility Keys Converter
Used to map StringKey Code to KeyInput Code and viceversa
Movement Class Movement
Describe a single movement in a path, used in MovementList
MovementList Class MovementList
Manages the variuos type of movement path that a enemy can do.
Point Class Point
Describe a single point in a custom path
PointPath Class PointPath
It can generate a movements list from a list of Point
 

Enum Summary
MovementList.MovementType Enum MovementList.MovementType
State Enum State
Define states of enemies
WeaponType Class WeaponType
Describres various type of weapon with it properties
